3/*++
4/* NAME
5/* smtpd_sasl_proto 3h
6/* SUMMARY
7/* Postfix SMTP protocol support for SASL authentication
8/* SYNOPSIS
9/* #include "smtpd_sasl_proto.h"
10/* DESCRIPTION
11/* .nf
12
13 /*
14 * SMTP protocol interface.
15 */
16extern int smtpd_sasl_auth_cmd(SMTPD_STATE *, int, SMTPD_TOKEN *);
17extern void smtpd_sasl_auth_reset(SMTPD_STATE *);
18extern char *smtpd_sasl_mail_opt(SMTPD_STATE *, const char *);
19extern void smtpd_sasl_mail_reset(SMTPD_STATE *);
20
21#define smtpd_sasl_auth_extern smtpd_sasl_login
22#define smtpd_sasl_auth_reset smtpd_sasl_logout
